title: Plainy and Gyaru
description:
A sequel to [i]This Plain Girl's Skirt Will Shrink By 0.1mm For Every Like[/i], comprising a collection of stories revolving around Plainy and Gyaru's life during their high school years and in university.

1) Daigakusei ni Natta Jimiko to Gal (大学生になった地味子とギャル)
2) Iru Nokori de Ninin Sankyaku no Renshuu suru Jimiko to Gal (居残りで二人三脚の練習する地味子とギャル)
3-4) Gal to Machiawasechuu ni Koe wo Kakerareta Jimiko (ギャルと待ち合わせ中に声を掛けられた地味子)
5) Oyakusoku (お約束)
6) Gakkou Kaeri Issho ni Shitagi wo Minikita Jimiko to Gal (学校帰り一緒に下着を見に来た地味子とギャル)

related.title: This Plain Girl's Skirt Will Shrink by 0.1mm for Every Like
